messages.subject: RE: Language learning
messages.msgSnippet: Unfortunately friendsabroad requires you to be 16 and older. Azure (the child who wants to learn Japanese) is only 13. But thanks. - Paula
messages.messageBody:
Unfortunately friendsabroad requires you to be 16 and older. Azure (the child who wants to learn Japanese) is only 13. But thanks.
- Paula

messages.subject: Language learning
messages.msgSnippet: My son is very interested in learning other languages and so we were checking out some ways to do that through the computer and came across this, we thought it
messages.messageBody:
My son is very interested in learning other languages and so we were
checking out some ways to do that through the computer and came across
this, we thought it was pretty cool and that maybe some of you might
want to check it out too. I remember someone else posting a while back
about their child being intererested in learning Japanese.

http://www.friendsabroad.com/
